entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. A few showers beginning overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
